title: Gun Orgs Facing Trump DOJ ‘Opposition’ Aren’t Sure What To Make Of Its New 2A Division
description: The Trump Department of Justice (DOJ) is opening a Second Amendment Rights division but some gun rights groups remain skeptical.
content:
Gun rights groups aren’t fully sold on the Trump Department of Justice’s (DOJ) decision to launch a new Second Amendment Rights division.
Advocates frustrated by the DOJ’s recent litigation position… [+6334 chars]
